title: Dandiya MASTI 2K16
tag_words: Dandiya, Navrathri Events In Mysore, Dance Events In Mysore
address: Rajgopalrao Rashinkar Kalyana Mantapa, Bannur Road, near Milk Dairy, Mysore
details: This Dasara, we bring you the best night of Navrathri with all the fun and masti at the Dandiya MASTI 2K16 event.<br>DJ, Dhol, Dinner &amp; Dance. The four big 'D's to compliment the significance of another big D: Dasara!!!<br>So get set to groove at the beats of top Gujarati and Bollywood numbers and give your dancing shoes the most rocking time of the year.<br><br>Date &amp; Time: October 8, 2016; 7PM to 11PM<br><br>Venue: Rajgopalrao Rashinkar Kalyana Mantapa, Bannur Road, near Milk Dairy, Mysore<br><br>For more details, please call: 9986227339<br><br><br><br>

title: 3rd Asia Pacific Pharmacovigilance Training Course
address: JSS University College of Pharmacy, Mysore
details: Adverse drug reactions (ADRs) are a major public health problem, and drug safety monitoring is of paramount importance to public health. An understanding of the clinical aspects of ADRs and the principles of drug safety are fundamental requirements for any professional working in the fields of pharmacovigilance or patient care.<br><br>This two week course, organised by JSS University and Uppsala Monitoring Centre (UMC), provides a solid practical foundation for those working in drug safety and aims to develop pharmacovigilance knowledge and skills in the Asia Pacific region. The course draws on the 18 years of experience UMC has in providing education and training to a global network of pharmacovigilance experts and healthcare professionals. The Asia Pacific course is tailored to regional needs and addresses challenges unique to this area.<br>

title: Yoga Therapist Training Program (8 weeks)
address: Atmavikasa Center of Yogic Sciences, Yoga Kutira, #18, Vasu Layout, Block I Ramakrishna Nagar, Mysore
details: An 8-week Yoga Therapist training program<div><br></div><div>Entry is FREE</div>

title: Traditional Hatha Yoga Teacher Training in India
address: AyurYoga Eco-Ashram, JP Hundi, Mysore
details: 30 Day Spiritual Adventure with traditional teachers at AyurYoga Eco-Ashram, between Mysore and Kerala, South India. From 17 November - 15 December, 2016<br><br>One month yoga teacher training retreat to experience the intensive and spiritual teachings and practices of traditional Hatha yoga - with more emphasis on breathing, awareness, meditation and practical philosophy to live an enlightened life in society. Also, you will be presented with a professional yoga teacher certification diploma, recognized by Yoga Alliance, with which you can start teaching yoga professionally around the world.<br><br>This 200 hours Yoga Teacher Training covers all the basic techniques and skills to get started on the noble path of sharing your practical knowledge of yoga - both practical &amp; intellectual - in a professional way. Even if you are not interested in teaching yoga, the practices and philosophy classes have detoxifying effect that will enrich your body, mind and intellect and helps you to understand the purpose of life and know-how to live a sane and peaceful life.<br><br>AyurYoga Eco-Ashram in India is a very unique place set in 20 acres of Organic Farm under development. We are located in the quiet countryside, one hour from Mysore, south India, on the banks of Kabini River.<br>

title: Ayurvedic Yoga Massage Training
address: ARYM Institute, Gokulam, Mysore
details: A 3 to 12-day training course open to everyone and all levels, beginners and professionals to discover, learn or deepen the method of Ayurvedic Yoga Massage.<br>Participants can register for 3, 6, 9 or the entire 12-day course.<br><br>12-DAY LEVELS 1-4 CERTIFIED THERAPIST COURSE: Nov. 16-29<br>Level 1 Introductory and Fundamentals part 1: Nov. 16-18<br>Level 2 Fundamentals part 2: Nov. 19-22 (20 is off)<br>Level 3 Advanced: Nov. 23-25<br>Level 4 Certified Therapist: Nov. 26-29 (27 is off)<br>12:30pm-4:30pm<br><br>12-DAY LEVEL 5 THERAPIST DIPLOMA COURSE: Nov. 16-29<br>Level 5 is accessible only to students who have previously completed Levels 1-4<br>12:30pm-4:30pm (Class timing will fit, as much as possible, the KPJAYI chanting or other shalas afternoon classes)<br>Day off on Sunday 20 and 27<br><br>You can also register to the masterclass on morning time:<br><br>4-DAY MASTERCLASS SERIES: NOV.22-25<br>Phase 1 (part 1 of 3) – The Lumbar Spine: Nov.22-23<br>Phase 2 – The Scapulae Belt: Nov.24-25<br>9:15am-11:30am (TBC)<br><br>FEES<br>-&gt; L.1-4 Certified Therapist: €580 EUR<br>-&gt; L.5 Therapist Diploma: €580 EUR<br>-&gt; L.1 Introduction and Fundamentals part 1: €180 EUR<br>-&gt; MasterClass : €70 EUR per Phase on 2-day<br>-&gt; Massage during on Clinic Day: INR1000 Minimum donation given to charitable organizations in Mysore<br><br>ONLINE REGISTRATION FORM<br>http://www.anantamassage.com/courses/registration.html?country=India&amp;city=Mysore#gf_5<br><br>REGISTRATION:<br>+91-7507018875 (WhatsApp)<br>contact@arym.org<br>NB. Priority given to L.1-4 and L.1-5 Registration<br><br>VENUE<br>ARYM Institute, 10th A main Road, near Doctors Corner, Gokulam 3rd stage, Mysore, India<br><br>FURTHERMORE<br>www.anantamassage.com/courses/as/india/india_en.html#NOV_2016_MYSORE<br>

title: 2nd Annual Conference on Emerging Trends in Marketing
tag_words: Marketing Seminar, Emerging Trends in Marketing
address: SDMIMD, #1, Siddharthanagar Post, Chamundi Hill Road, Mysore
details: Marketing has undergone a tectonic shift in the past decade. The exponential growth and diffusion of technology and increasing demands by customers have put the marketers in an unenviable spot. The conventional marketing concepts of 4 Ps, PLC and STP is undergoing a refresh and reboot.<br><br>New paradigms, innovation and advanced practices in marketing are emerging by the day – be it usage of big data in customer relationship, data analytics in media planning and promotion, intensive and targeted use of social media in marketing communication, apps and videos as a tool for customer engagement, Omni-channel in retailing, servitization in services marketing, growing importance of ethics, sustainability and social responsibility in marketing, flipping of B2B marketing from being sales driven to customer experience driven…. the list is endless.<br><br>The marketers are challenged at every stage. While the management and CFOs demand maximum ROI on marketing investment, the customers on the other hand demand maximum worth for their dosh. The marketer is caught between sea and devil.<br><br>Registration is Free.<br>

title: Mega Matrimony Meet - Brahmin Community
address: Shri Sharadha Peetham, Mysore
details: Sri Sankara Matrimony is organizing a Mega Matrimony Meet for Brahmin community on October 23rd, 2016 in the<br>Shi Sharada Peetham, Mysuru, Karnataka 570004<br><br>How to participate:<br><br>Call 080-4300 0999 to participate in the meet.<br><br>Prospective brides and grooms from Brahmin community residing in Udupi and other nearby places [Mysuru] can register. For queries, you can call us on 080-43000099 or 90 19 300 600. You can also get more detail on www.srisankaramatrimony.com and write back to us.<br>

title: Mysore Dasara Bicycle Race - 2016
address: Chamundi Vihar Stadium, Hyder Ali Road, Nazarbad, Mysore
details: Mysore Dasara is the Nadahabba (state-festival) of the state of Karnataka and as always professional bike race season is back. The action kicks off in earnest at the Mysuru District and People’s Choice Classic on October 9th 2016, with races then taking place around the state.<br><br>Race Details<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Men, the race is for a distance of 100 kilometers: 2 laps of the ring road and the finishing line on Chamundi Betta.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Women, the race is for a distance of 54 kilometers: 1 lap of the ring road and the finishing line is on Chamundi Betta.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The races will be flagged off from Chamundi Vihar Stadium at 6 am on October 9, 2016.<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The prize money for top 6 places is 1,55,000/- for each category.<br><br><br>Registrations: At Cyclopedia Interested may register before October 8 by 4 pm at Cyclopedia. [0821-4252299]<br><br>Note: No Spot Registrations<br>

title: Mysore Dasara Event - Day 10
tag_words: Vijayadashami, Jamboo Savari, Torchlight Parade, Bal Bhavan
address: Mysore Palace premises
details: Mysore Dasara procession - Jamboo Savari:<br>A traditional Dasara procession, the main attraction of this procession is the idol of the Goddess Chamundeshwari which is placed in a Golden Howdah on the top of a decorated elephant.<br>The original name to this procession is Jumbi Savari (going to the Shami tree).<br>After the Jamboo Savari, a torchlight parade takes place in the evening at the Bannimantap Parade Grounds.<br>Various cultural music and dance concerts are held in auditoriums <br>around Mysore city.<br><br>Torch Light Parade at Bannimantap Grounds<br>Venue : Bannimantap Grounds<br>08:00 AM-10:00 PM :Torch Light Parade includes Shwetahswa team, tent pegging, laser show and other cultural programmes Events list of Torch Light Parade will be updated soon<br><br><br>Mysuru Dasara Procession<br>Venue : Mysore Palace<br>02:16 PM-04:30 PM :'Nandi Dhwaja Pooje, 2:45 PM - Inauguration of the 'Vijaya Dashami' Procession. <br>

title: Mysore Dasara Event - Day 9
address: Mysore Palace premises
details: Mahanavami / Ayudha Pooja:<br>The ninth day is called Mahanavami.<br>The royal family performs the Ayudha Pooja as a part of Dasara, inside the palace grounds. A series of rituals are observed, the first being worship of the weapons on the Mahanavami Day (9th day), followed by Kusumananda - the tradition of breaking a pumpkin in the palace grounds. After this, the weapons are carried in a golden palanquin to the Bhuvaneshwari temple for worship. The royal sword is worshipped and is taken on a procession involving elephants, camels and horses.<br>Various cultural music and dance concerts are held in auditoriums <br>around Mysore city.<br><br><br>Cultural Programmes at Townhall<br>Venue : Townhall<br>10:00 AM-12:00 PM :Social Play- Rangayyana Raadhantha- Malathi, Mysuru<br>03:00 PM-05:00 PM :Jamitra Urs, Bhavaikyatha Vedike Bangalore<br>10:00 AM-12:00 PM :Social Play- Rangayyana Raadhantha- Malathi, Mysuru<br>03:00 PM-05:00 PM :Jamitra Urs, Bhavaikyatha Vedike Bangalore<br>07:00 PM-09:00 PM :Play- Marana Mrudanga - Abhiyanthararu, Mysuru<br><br><br>Cultural Programmes at Kalamandir<br>Venue : Kalamandir<br>05:30 PM-06:00 PM :Rangageethe by Sri Nagendra Prasad &amp; Team, Mysuru<br>06:00 PM-07:00 PM :Tiger &amp; Lion Dance by South Zone Cultural Centre, Tanjore<br>07:00 PM-08:00 PM :Light Music by Sri C. details: Durgashtami:<br>The 8th day is Durgashtami. title: Mysore Dusshera
address: Mysore
details: Mysore Dasara is the Nadahabba or the State-Festival of the State of Karnataka, called as Navaratri meaning Nine-Nights, a 10-day festival, celebrated with utmost spectacle and joy in the city of Mysore. The Dasara festivities have arich history of more than 400 years<br>
